Description: 
This application implements a command to demonstrate the use of the long transaction.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use Transaction.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the Transaction.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "Test_LongTransRefEdit" command, which changes the color of the circle in the dwg selected, and you can preview the modified effect.
